          <title>
            <string language="en">Diagrams of chemical containers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramme der chemischen Behälter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagrammes des récipients chimiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagramas de recipientes químicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schemi dei contenitori chimici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγράμματα των χημικών εμπορευματοκιβωτίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagramas de envases químicos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations, showing what some standard pieces of laboratory apparatus look like. The other illustration shows the correct way to draw these.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beaker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical apparatus</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeigend an zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, 
was einige Standardstücke Laborapparate wie aussehen. Die 
andere Abbildung zeigt die korrekte Methode, diese zu zeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations, montrant à
ce que ressemblent quelques morceaux standard d'appareils de 
laboratoire. L'autre illustration montre la voie correcte de 
dessiner ces derniers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações, mostrando o que
algumas partes padrão de instrumentos de laboratório olham como. 
A outra ilustração mostra a maneira correta desenhar estes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni, mostrando 
a che cosa alcune parti standard dei dispositivi di laboratorio 
assomigliano. L'altra illustrazione mostra il modo corretto 
dissipare questi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων, που εμφανίζουν τι μερικά 
πρότυπα κομμάτια των εργαστηριακών συσκευών μοιάζουν με. Η 
άλλη απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σωστό τρόπο να συρθούν αυτοί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones, mostrando 
lo que parecen algunos pedazos estándares de aparatos de laboratorio.
La otra ilustración muestra la manera correcta de trazar 
éstos.</string>
          </description>
